title: Primary Teacher

renewed-issues.note: Renewal record gives volume number as 109, but this is clearly a typographical error

renewed-contributions.title: Glory to God
renewed-contributions.note: The renewal record says this musical composition appeared in the October-December 1957 issue of 'Primary Teacher', but does not make clear whether it appeared in this Primary Teacher or one of the other periodicals linked here with the same title.

renewed-contributions.title: Let Us Love One Another
renewed-contributions.note: Benson is credited for the music, but the Nazarene Publishing House claims the copyright as a work for hire.

renewed-contributions.title: A New Commandment
renewed-contributions.note: Benson is credited for the music, but the Nazarene Publishing House claims the copyright as a work for hire.

renewed-contributions.title: Do Unto Others
renewed-contributions.note: Benson is credited for the music, but the Nazarene Publishing House claims the copyright as a work for hire.

renewed-contributions.title: Help Me to Grow Like Jesus
renewed-contributions.note: Jones is credited for the words, and Benson for the music, but the Nazarene Publishing House claims the copyright as a work for hire.

renewed-contributions.title: Lord, I Will Love Thee
renewed-contributions.note: The original registration record for this issue notes that Beacon Hill Press is a trade name for Nazarene Publishing House.

renewed-contributions.title: When We Are Friends of Jesus
renewed-contributions.note: The original registration record for this issue notes that Beacon Hill Press is a trade name for Nazarene Publishing House.

renewed-contributions.title: Thanks Be Unto God
renewed-contributions.note: The renewal record says this musical composition appeared in the October-December 1963 issue of 'Primary Teacher', but does not make clear whether it appeared in this Primary Teacher or one of the other periodicals linked here with the same title.

additional-notes: Copyrights for magazines with the same title for various Protestant churches were also registered in some of the same years as the Nazarene Publishing House publication described here.  We do not know if they shared content in common.

Contribution renewals shown here are for works that have renewal records filed as Contributions to Periodicals that specifically mention 'Primary Teacher'.  It is possible that there may also be active renewals filed under Music for other musical compositions that appeared in Primary Teacher.  We have not systematically surveyed Music renewals.
